graph_title: Prevalence of anaemia in women aged 15 to 49 years, by pregnancy status (percentage)
indicator_name: Prevalence of anaemia in women aged 15 to 49 years, by pregnancy status (percentage)
SDG_GOAL: Goal 2: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
SDG_TARGET: Target 2.2: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 2.2.3: Prevalence of anaemia in women aged 15-49 years, by pregnancy status (percentage)
STAT_CONC_DEF: Percentage of women aged 15−49 years with a haemoglobin concentration less than 120 g/L for non-pregnant women and lactating women, and less than 110 g/L for pregnant women, adjusted for altitude and smoking.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 2: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
